forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Dr. Update or How I learned to Love version 165.5

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new this Friday (you're on version [version]). Hope you enjoy!
If someone hasn't been on for over a month, their profile will now show when they were last active (where the Ping button is when they're on)! Thx Spike!
The Attract/ Repel commands should now not work on their own Thing anymore! Thx Tangerine!
We fixed how Snap Angles and such would look wrong when using the special optimized camera modes when streaming!
To simplify usage & understanding, the "Edit Clone" button is now twice as big, and just says "Edit"!
The Nift dialog's "Make Private/ Public" button was meant to be on the dialog backside (instead of half-overlaying the header), that's fixed now!
We added the commands "enable setting lock angles/ position"... they fully lock a part's rotation/ position when editing! For scripting these see anyland.com/scripting
We fixed some issues with the "enable setting" keyboard auto-completion & help!
The "Scale All Parts" and "Scale All Parts Uniformly" buttons now properly disable each other, as they weren't simultaneously usable to begin with!
objects still attract/repel themselves and yes i have the latest update.
